title: SBD SA - South African Powerlifting
shortDescription: Official powerlifting training app for South African athletes
fullDescription:
SBD SA is the premier powerlifting training app designed specifically for South African athletes. Whether you're a beginner or an elite lifter, our app provides everything you need to track your progress, follow proven training programs, and compete in South African powerlifting events.

KEY FEATURES:

üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è TRAINING LOGS
‚Ä¢ Track your squat, bench press, and deadlift workouts
‚Ä¢ Calculate your 1RM using proven formulas (Brzycki, Epley, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Automatic plate calculator for South African gym plates
‚Ä¢ RPE (Rate of Perceived Exertion) tracking for optimal training
‚Ä¢ Rest timer between sets

üì± SOUTH AFRICAN SPECIFIC
‚Ä¢ Designed for South African powerlifting standards
‚Ä¢ Support for kg and lbs measurements
‚Ä¢ Localized for South African gym conditions
‚Ä¢ Integration with SBD South Africa events
‚Ä¢ Membership number tracking for SBD SA members

üìä PROGRESS ANALYSIS
‚Ä¢ Personal record tracking
‚Ä¢ Wilks score calculation for fair strength comparison
‚Ä¢ Training volume and intensity graphs
‚Ä¢ Bodyweight and strength ratio analysis
‚Ä¢ Monthly and yearly progress reports

üèÜ TRAINING PROGRAMS
‚Ä¢ 5/3/1 Powerlifting Program
‚Ä¢ Starting Strength for beginners
‚Ä¢ Custom program creation
‚Ä¢ Program templates from South African coaches
‚Ä¢ Weekly training schedules

üîÑ OFFLINE SUPPORT
‚Ä¢ Full offline functionality for gym areas with poor connectivity
‚Ä¢ Automatic sync when connection is restored
‚Ä¢ No internet required for workout logging
‚Ä¢ Local data storage on your device

üéØ COMPETITION PREP
‚Ä¢ Meet preparation tools
‚Ä¢ Weight class tracking
‚Ä¢ Attempt selection calculator
‚Ä¢ Competition day checklist
‚Ä¢ South African powerlifting rules reference

PERFECT FOR:
‚Ä¢ Powerlifters training in South Africa
‚Ä¢ SBD South Africa members
‚Ä¢ Gym-goers wanting to start powerlifting
‚Ä¢ Coaches training powerlifting athletes
‚Ä¢ Anyone interested in strength training

WHY CHOOSE SBD SA?

Built specifically for the South African powerlifting community, SBD SA understands the unique challenges of training in South Africa. From connectivity issues in rural areas to the specific equipment found in South African gyms, our app is designed to help you succeed regardless of your location or experience level.

Download SBD SA today and join the growing community of South African powerlifters who are taking their strength to the next level!
